data.text:
Directors - TECHTRON AGRO INDUSTRIES LIMITED

The company has 3 directors and no reported key management personnel.

The longest serving directors currently on board are Krishnadev Rao Kasuganti and Venkateswara Rao Kuchipudi who were appointed on 01 June, 1992. They have been on the board for more than 32 years. The most recently appointed director is Durga Prasad Gorrepati, who was appointed on 18 November, 2011.

Krishnadev Rao Kasuganti has the largest number of other directorships with a seat at a total of 2 companies. In total, the company is connected to 1 other companies through its directors.

NAME DESIGNATION APPOINTMENT DATE KRISHNADEV RAO KASUGANTI Director 01 June, 1992 Other directorships - CHILDFIRST EDUCATION INDIA PRIVATE LIMITED, VENKATESWARA RAO KUCHIPUDI Director 01 June, 1992 No other directorships DURGA PRASAD GORREPATI Director 18 November, 2011 No other directorships
